title: Mass Effect 3 DLC Pack v3
description:
== Description ==
This DLC Pack includes all Mass Effect 3 DLCs and all the content, that was released as promotional.
This includes Collector's Edition items and many more.
Also included are patches needed to run new content, updating the game to the newest version available.
And as if that wasn't enough of goodness, everything comes with a neat installer, that does most of the job.

Some DLCs and other content require unlocking with save editor.
Provided inside the image is the best save editor for this job, and step-by-step instructions how to do it.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
